content:
# Timeblocks

## v1

```plain text
6:30 - 8:15   | Morning Routine
8:15 - 8:30   | Chatting w/ friends
8:30 - 10:00  | Finish replying to all Linkedin + Facebook messages
10:00 - 11:00 | Blog line numbers (maybe using cheerio)

9:00 - 11:00  | Do outreach on StackOverflow by creating Dialect blog posts to answer React questions
11:00 - 11:15 | Dialect Standup
12:45 - 16:00 | Finish Founder.University Tasks
16:00 - 17:00 | Startup School Group Session

19:00 - 20:00 | Early evening routine
20:00 - 24:00 | Gymnastics Gym
24:00 | Sleep
```

# Routines

## Morning

```plain text
6:30 - 6:45 | Wake up, brush teeth, bike to gym
6:45 - 7:15 | Gym
7:15 - 7:25 | Bike home
7:25 - 7:30 | Quick Shower
```

## Evening

```plain text
22:30 - 22:40 | Prepare gym bag & clothes for tomorrow, create next dayâ€™s daily timeblock; brush teeth
22:40 - 23:00 | Writing Practice
23:00 - 23:20 | Reading
23:20 - 23:30 | Sleep
```
